modName: Foods for Run with Skooma for Run
summary:
This mod for enhanced foods and hunger.
Optional mods for exciting skooma and FoodRestoreHealthDuration fix.
Add optional mod of sleeping (12/02/18).
descriptionHtml:
Foods for Run (and Skooma for Run)
Ver. 120218b

This mod for enhanced foods and hunger.
Optional mods for exciting skooma and FoodRestoreHealthDuration fix.
Add optional mod of sleeping (12/02/18).

Description
 Add Fortify Stamina +30 and Regenerate Stamina +30% to bread and foods of 0.3 WEIGHT or over.
 0.2 WEIGHT foods are +20 and +20%. 0.1 WEIGHT foods are +10 and +10%. Alcoholic beverages don\'t increase Regenerate Stamina.
 Duration times are 2 minutes / 0.1 WEIGHT. Materials are 30 seconds / 0.1 WEIGHT.

Hardcore
 You want hardcore flaver, modify your Stamina with console.
player.modav stamina -30
 (\"player.modav stamina 30\" to recover.)

Menu
Leg of Goat Roast (1 WEIGHT)
 Restore 10 points of Health. Stamina is increased by 30 points for 20 minutes. Stamina Regenerats 30% faster for 20 minutes.
Bread (0.2 WEIGHT)
 Restore 2 points of Health. Stamina is increased by 30 points for 4 minutes. Stamina Regenerats 30% faster for 4 minutes.
Grilled Chicken Breast (0.2 WEIGHT)
 Restore 5 points of Health. Stamina is increased by 20 points for 4 minutes. Stamina Regenerats 20% faster for 4 minutes.
Goat Cheese Wheel (2 WEIGHT)
 Restore 15 points of Health. Stamina is increased by 30 points for 10 minutes. Stamina Regenerats 30% faster for 10 minutes.
Red Apple (0.1 WEIGHT)
 Restore 2 points of Health. Stamina is increased by 10 points for 30 seconds. Stamina Regenerats 10% faster for 30 seconds.
(Skyrim 1 day = Real 72 minutes)

Skooma for Run
 Change Skooma\'s effect.
 Restore 3 points of Stamina per second for 30 seconds. Causes 1 points damage for 30 seconds.
 If unnecessary, remove check of Skooma for run.esp.

FoodRHealthDuration.esp
 Vanilla Actor Value is HealRateMult. Change it for Health.
 If unnecessary, remove check of FoodRHealthDuration.esp.

Sleeping for Little Magicka
Rested:2% increased skill-up speed for 16 hours,  Fortify Magicka +10 for 16 hours. <- Vanilla:5% increased skill-up speed for 8 hours.
Well Rested:5% increased skill-up speed for 16 hours,  Fortify Magicka +10 for 16 hours. <- Vanilla:10% increased skill-up speed for 8 hours.
Lover\'s Comfort:8% increased skill-up speed for 16 hours,  Fortify Magicka +10 for 16 hours. <- Vanilla:15% increased skill-up speed for 8 hours.
 You want hardcore flaver, modify your Magicka with console.
player.modav magicka -10
 (\"player.modav magicka 10\" to recover.)
 If unnecessary, remove check of Sleeping for Little Magicka.esp.

Install/Uninstall
 Put Foods for Run.esp and Skooma for Run.esp and FoodRHealthDuration.esp and Sleeping for Little Magicka.esp in Data folder.
/Remove Foods for Run.esp and Skooma for Run.esp and FoodRHealthDuration.esp and Sleeping for Little Magicka.esp from Data folder.

Note
 Effects of two foods or more aren\'t added (except skooma).
 If Short duration time effect is only available, long duration time effect remains.
 Cheese Wheel and Sliced Cheese are material, Cheese Wedge aren\'t material.
 Correctly, Cabbage and Cheese Wedge are 0.25 WEIGHT, their effects are as 0.3 WEIGHT.
 Homecooked Meal is overhauled.
 Effect of the lover stone isn\'t changed.
 Special thanks. I use these mods with HBE - Hardcore and Balanced Experience.
 Special thanks. Thinking of Sleeping for Little Magicka, I was helped by comments.

Ver.120218b:Add Sleeping for Little Magicka.
Ver.120205b2:Include FoodRHealthDuration.esp and change filename.
author: hirhir
